message.name: T4A_PAYER_NAME
message.locale: Service Canada

message.name: TAX_SLIP_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Duplicate

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_TAX_SLIP_STATUS
message.locale: A tax slip with a status of %1c cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_TAX_SLIP_TYPE
message.locale: %1c tax slips cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_TAX_SLIP_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Duplicate tax slips cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_BOTH_OTHER_AND_INDIAN_INCOME_ENTERED
message.locale: Both Other Income and Status Indian Income cannot be entered.

message.name: ERR_NEITHER_OTHER_NOR_INDIAN_INCOME_ENTERED
message.locale: Either Other Income or Status Indian Income must be entered.

message.name: ERR_BOX_NUMBER_FORMAT
message.locale: The Box %1s must be a number.

message.name: ERR_ATTRIBUTE_NUMBER_FORMAT
message.locale: %1s must be a number.

message.name: ERR_BOX_BOOLEAN_FORMAT
message.locale: The Box %1s must be either Yes or No.

message.name: ERR_ATTRIBUTE_BOOLEAN_FORMAT
message.locale: %1s must be either Yes or No.

message.name: ERR_BOX_NEGATIVE_NUMBER
message.locale: The Box %1s must be positive.

message.name: ERR_ATTRIBUTE_NEGATIVE_NUMBER
message.locale: %1s must be positive.

message.name: ERR_AMEND_TAX_SLIP_STATUS
message.locale: A tax slip with a status of %1c cannot be amended.

message.name: ERR_AMEND_TAX_SLIP_TYPE
message.locale: %1c tax slips cannot be amended.

message.name: ERR_NO_QUEBEC_ADDRESS
message.locale: The client's province is not Quebec as of December 31st for the tax year %1n.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_TAX_SLIP_STATUS
message.locale: A new tax slip cannot be created from a tax slip with a status of %1c.

message.name: ERR_CREATE_TAX_SLIP_TYPE
message.locale: A new tax slip cannot be created from a tax slip that is of type %1c.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLE_TAX_SLIPS_IN_DRAFT_STATUS
message.locale: There already exists a tax slip in '%1c' status and another tax slip cannot be created.

message.name: TAX_SLIP_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: Tax Slips with a status of '%1s' cannot be deleted.

message.name: TAX_SLIP_CANNOT_BE_ISSUED_IF_NOT_IN_DRAFT_STATUS
message.locale: Tax Slips with a status of '%1s' cannot be issued.

message.name: TAX_SLIP_ALREADY_EXISTS_IN_REQUESTED_MODE
message.locale: There already exists a tax slip in '%1s' and we cannot issue another slip.

message.name: TAX_SLIP_CANNOT_BE_ISSUED_AS_DUPLICATE
message.locale: Tax Slips with a status of '%1s' cannot be issued as Duplicate.

message.name: ERR_TAX_SLIP_NEGATIVE_AMOUNT
message.locale: Tax Slips cannot have a negative amount.
